short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Allow novelists to paste text into the Tapas editor and retain bold/italic formatting.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Thie extension allows novelists to paste text into the Tapas editor and retain bold/italic formatting. Simply click the extension icon while on the series edit page, and hit "Paste Into Editor"
